channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Andrea Bocelli stumbles in impromptu Oval Office performance for Trump: 'Time to say goodbye'
Here's why Trump says he's commuting prison sentence of ex-GOP Rep. George Santos
item.description: Santos was sentenced to more than seven years in federal prison earlier this year after being convicted of wire fraud and aggravated identity theft.

item.title: What Trump and Zelenskyy are saying after White House meeting on ending Russia's war
item.description: Zelenskyy was in Washington to make his case for America’s Tomahawk cruise missiles and other military assets.

item.title: Several hurt after apartment balcony collapses in Cincinnati
item.description: At least 10 people were injured when the wooden balcony of a third-floor apartment collapsed near the campus of the University of Cincinnati, official...

item.title: Trump commutes George Santos' prison sentence
item.description: In a post on Truth Social, the president said the ex-New York congressman has been "horribly mistreated" in prison.

item.title: Government shutdown becomes third-longest in history with no end in sight
item.description: The government shutdown is now the third-longest funding lapse in modern history, and the Senate won't meet until Monday.

item.title: Alaska storm damage could displace some evacuees for at least 18 months
item.description: Anchorage leaders said Friday they expect as many as 1,600 people to be evacuated to the state's largest city.

item.title: 10/17: CBS Evening News Plus
item.description: Nuclear agency workers set to be furloughed as shutdown continues; Reporter's Notebook: What is work for?

item.title: School staffer dies following alleged assault by 14-year-old student: DA
item.description: The incident occurred at Meadowridge Academy, a therapeutic residential school geared toward students ages 12 to 21 in rural Swansea.
